data.text:
Billiards—a puzzle combining one's body and 
mind… I called you here today because I knew you 
would make for a worthy opponent…
data.name: Tanino Gimlet
data.processed:
<story>Billiards—a puzzle combining one's body and 
<story>mind… I called you here today because I knew you 
<story>would make for a worthy opponent…

data.text:
However, you're stronger than I could have ever 
imagined—a true nightmare! An immovable sniper! 
You have truly blown past all of my expectations!
data.name: Tanino Gimlet
data.processed:
<story>However, you're stronger than I could have ever 
<story>imagined—a true nightmare! An immovable sniper! 
<story>You have truly blown past all of my expectations!

data.text:
Properly executed collision and trajectory 
leading to a pocket. Perfectly executed. Hmph, 
this isn't so bad.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>Properly executed collision and trajectory 
<story>leading to a pocket. Perfectly executed. Hmph, 
<story>this isn't so bad.

data.text:
Proper body manipulation is required 
for this game, and may help with racing. 
I thank you for inviting me.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>Proper body manipulation is required 
<story>for this game, and may help with racing. 
<story>I thank you for inviting me.

data.text:
Hmph! I humbly accept your words, and thank you 
as well for attending.
data.name: Tanino Gimlet
data.processed:
<story>Hmph! I humbly accept your words, and thank you 
<story>as well for attending.

data.text:
However, our pleasure has only just begun. Do 
you not hear it? The sound of Gaia wailing for 
even more splendor.
data.name: Tanino Gimlet
data.processed:
<story>However, our pleasure has only just begun. Do 
<story>you not hear it? The sound of Gaia wailing for 
<story>even more splendor.

data.text: So, you would like a rematch?
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>So, you would like a rematch?

data.text:
With every destruction comes rebirth, 
and with every rebirth comes destruction! 
Super Trick Shot!
data.name: Tanino Gimlet
data.processed:
<story>With every destruction comes rebirth, 
<story>and with every rebirth comes destruction! 
<story>Super Trick Shot!

data.text:
Tanino Gimlet hits the cue ball to begin the 
match, swiftly sinking one after another. Soon, 
only one ball remained.
data.processed:
<story>Tanino Gimlet hits the cue ball to begin the 
<story>match, swiftly sinking one after another. Soon, 
<story>only one ball remained.

data.text: It'll be my victory once I pocket this!
data.name: Tanino Gimlet
data.processed: <story>It'll be my victory once I pocket this!

data.text: Gimlet… There's a hole… in the wall.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>Gimlet… There's a hole… in the wall.

data.text:
Hmph. Looks as though my impulsiveness 
has resulted in the end of that play. 
Shall we begin act two of our holiday— 
Of Apologies And Reparations?
data.name: Tanino Gimlet
data.processed:
<story>Hmph. Looks as though my impulsiveness 
<story>has resulted in the end of that play. 
<story>Shall we begin act two of our holiday— 
<story>Of Apologies And Reparations?

data.text: How long can you continue accelerating for?! My lungs are burning and my legs hurt so much, yet she seems to be enjoying herself!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: How long can you continue accelerating for?! My lungs are burning and my legs hurt so much, yet she seems to be enjoying herself!

data.text: ngh! I can't lose, I won't lose! I need to push past her, my limits, and everything else standing in my way!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: ngh! I can't lose, I won't lose! I need to push past her, my limits, and everything else standing in my way!

data.text: I need to go faster, faster, faster, and faster! I can go so much faster! The path forward is much more free!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: I need to go faster, faster, faster, and faster! I can go so much faster! The path forward is much more free!

data.text:
Hey, C.B… we were running 
solo at first, weren't we?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Hey, C.B… we were running 
<story>solo at first, weren't we?

data.text:
Yup. I'm not really sure how or when, but we 
started competing against one another.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Yup. I'm not really sure how or when, but we 
<story>started competing against one another.

data.text: Wait, where are we?!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Wait, where are we?!

data.text:
Ahaha! It sure is easy to get lost when you get 
absorbed into running, huh? Well, as long as we 
walk back we'll eventually make it back home.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha! It sure is easy to get lost when you get 
<story>absorbed into running, huh? Well, as long as we 
<story>walk back we'll eventually make it back home.

data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Hold on, wait a second! Don't just walk away 
<story>from me! We need to get up somewhere high! C.B., 
<story>let's go climb up that cliff!

data.text: Hmm? That's pretty unconventional, huh?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Hmm? That's pretty unconventional, huh?

data.text: I don't wanna hear that from you!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>I don't wanna hear that from you!

data.text:
I figured I'd know where you were, but no matter 
where I checked I couldn't find you. It's 
already gotten so late…
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>I figured I'd know where you were, but no matter 
<story>where I checked I couldn't find you. It's 
<story>already gotten so late…

data.text: …but I'm glad I found you, Ramonu.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>…but I'm glad I found you, Ramonu.

data.text:
My, it's good to see you. But I did not ask for 
you to look for me.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>My, it's good to see you. But I did not ask for 
<story>you to look for me.

data.text:
You know I couldn't leave you alone. 
Now can you tell me why…
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>You know I couldn't leave you alone. 
<story>Now can you tell me why…

data.text:
Why do you refuse to return home after your 
races? Even more so when you display an 
immaculate performance.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Why do you refuse to return home after your 
<story>races? Even more so when you display an 
<story>immaculate performance.

data.text:
Now now, Miss Emperor. Does it bother you when 
you aren't in control of everything?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Now now, Miss Emperor. Does it bother you when 
<story>you aren't in control of everything?

data.text:
That was not my intention. I simply 
dislike staying out all night, but regardless 
I'll proceed with the formal paperwork 
to allow you to do so.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>That was not my intention. I simply 
<story>dislike staying out all night, but regardless 
<story>I'll proceed with the formal paperwork 
<story>to allow you to do so.

data.text:
I don't need permission. More importantly, 
you're wise. You likely already 
know why I do this.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>I don't need permission. More importantly, 
<story>you're wise. You likely already 
<story>know why I do this.

data.text:
Because of your unparalleled love for racing. At 
least that's what it seems like on the surface. 
However, you're still an unknown variable to me.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Because of your unparalleled love for racing. At 
<story>least that's what it seems like on the surface. 
<story>However, you're still an unknown variable to me.

data.text: That's right. Spoken like a true ally of justice.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>That's right. Spoken like a true ally of justice.

data.text:
I need nothing but the turf. As long as I can 
love that, I need nothing more. However…
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>I need nothing but the turf. As long as I can 
<story>love that, I need nothing more. However…

data.text:
When one burns hotter than the sun, the only 
thing that can cool them down is the cool night 
sky. The past is simply a hindrance to my love.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>When one burns hotter than the sun, the only 
<story>thing that can cool them down is the cool night 
<story>sky. The past is simply a hindrance to my love.

data.text:
Oh, Ramonu headed back to the dormitory. Sorry 
it took so long. I'll be back soon, but feel 
free to head back to sleep, alright? Hmm?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Oh, Ramonu headed back to the dormitory. Sorry 
<story>it took so long. I'll be back soon, but feel 
<story>free to head back to sleep, alright? Hmm?

data.text:
Wait, there's more students that haven't come 
back yet? That's… no, it shouldn't be a problem. 
I'll go and bring them back.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Wait, there's more students that haven't come 
<story>back yet? That's… no, it shouldn't be a problem. 
<story>I'll go and bring them back.

data.text:
Nngh! Apollo, how dare you?! As he swung his 
mallet, he chased the darkness away.
data.name: Tanino Gimlet
data.processed:
<story>Nngh! Apollo, how dare you?! As he swung his 
<story>mallet, he chased the darkness away.

data.text: You two are quite late.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>You two are quite late.

data.text:
Sorry. We are past curfew because we were 
repairing a wall.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>Sorry. We are past curfew because we were 
<story>repairing a wall.

data.text: Wooah!! We're finally back on a familiar road!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed: <story>Wooah!! We're finally back on a familiar road!

data.text:
Jeez, I'm so exhausted. Wait, hmm? What're those 
girls up to? Going for a walk?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Jeez, I'm so exhausted. Wait, hmm? What're those 
<story>girls up to? Going for a walk?

data.text:
Nah, looks like they're writing formal 
apologies… Dangit! I was hoping we'd get back 
into the dorms without them seeing us too.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
data.processed:
<story>Nah, looks like they're writing formal 
<story>apologies… Dangit! I was hoping we'd get back 
<story>into the dorms without them seeing us too.

data.text:
Looks like everyone's back. I'd like 
to say "where in the world have you been?", 
but they all look so exhausted so I guess 
I'll hold off for now.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Looks like everyone's back. I'd like 
<story>to say "where in the world have you been?", 
<story>but they all look so exhausted so I guess 
<story>I'll hold off for now.

data.text:
Now why don't we head home? It's going 
to be morning soon, and with it will 
come one more beautiful day.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Now why don't we head home? It's going 
<story>to be morning soon, and with it will 
<story>come one more beautiful day.
